sentences.english: Tainan and its surrounding area have many places of historical interest to visit.
sentences.chinese: 台南和其周围地区有许多历史名胜可游览。

sentences.english: I went to Tainan and enjoyed the attractions, then Lugang the historical town.
sentences.chinese: 我到了台南有名的景点，然后是具有历史意义的鹿港。

sentences.english: You're from Tainan? I always thought you're from the north.
sentences.chinese: 你家在台南喔？我一直以为你是北部人。

sentences.english: We went to Baihe in Tainan for its famous lotus.
sentences.chinese: 我们在七月中到台南白河看他们的莲花。

sentences.english: Which bus goes to Tainan in the morning?
sentences.chinese: 那一号公车在早晨时开往台南？

sentences.english: A one-way ticket from Tainan to Kaohsiung costs 69 NT dollars.
sentences.chinese: 台南到高雄的单程票是新台币69元。

sentences.english: I used to live in tainan but now I live in Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 本人曩昔住在台南，但如今住在台北。

sentences.english: THSR of TaiNan station is located on the KuiJen of TaiNan county.
sentences.chinese: 台湾高铁台南站位于台南县的归仁乡。

sentences.english: THSR of TaiNan station is located on the KuiJen of TaiNan county.
sentences.chinese: 台湾高铁台南站位于台南县的归仁乡。

sentences.english: Billy announced to us today that he was being transferred to the Tainan branch of our company.
sentences.chinese: 比利今天跟我们宣布他即将被调到台南的分公司。

sentences.english: We'll hike through mahogany forests and pay a visit to some Taiwanese macaques.
sentences.chinese: 一块到台南的桃花心木林爬山，和到乌山看猕猴。

sentences.english: The strong typhoon Morakot ruined the beautiful Xiaolin village in Tainan.
sentences.chinese: 强台风“莫拉克”毁坏了台南美丽的小林村。

sentences.english: It was on the site of the new Tainan Science-based Industrial Park, right?
sentences.chinese: 那是在新的台南科学园区里发现的，对吗？

sentences.english: This week, from Keelung to Tainan, the temperatures have barely hit 10℃ in the mornings.
sentences.chinese: 本周从基隆到台南，清晨低温都不到10℃。

sentences.english: Now I study on grade six form in Tainan Municipal Dong-guang Elementary School.
sentences.chinese: 现在我在台南市东光国民小学就读。

sentences.english: Xinzhu was rated the most liveable place behind Taipei, followed by Tainan and Taizhong cities.
sentences.chinese: 新竹的名次仅次于台北，接著是台南及台中市。
